medium: Pen and brown ink on laid paper
title: Standing Draped Male and Female Figures
marks:
Inscription and Stamp

ULC, in grey: [R - V]; on
description: two standing figures--male on left, female on right; each figure has PR arm held out in front of them; both figures heavily draped; man has curly shoulder-length hair and beard and wears sandals; woman has long curly hair covered with headscarf; verso:  light sketch of a face
